doc:
Joe Gladwin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Gladwin 0 Joseph Gladwin (22 January 1906 – 11 March 1987) was an English actor, best known in his roles as Fred Jackson in Coronation Street and Wally Batty in the world's longest-running sitcom, Last of the Summer Wine (1975, 1976–87). Joseph_Gladwin ( 22_January_1906 – 11_March_1987 ) was an_English_actor , best_known in his_roles as Fred_Jackson in Coronation_Street and Wally_Batty in the_world 's_longest-running_sitcom , Last of the_Summer_Wine ( 1975_,_1976 – 87 ) .
